title: Lava Absorbant Sponge
info: The Lava Absorbant Sponge is an item which functions similarly to the Super Absorbant Sponge, but absorbs Lava instead of Water. When used on a tile occupied with lava, it will delete the tile. The Lava Absorbant Sponge can be used an unlimited amount of times. It will not work on any other liquids.
stat:
